core.title: Dashboard
core.desc: Core module for all mandatory controls.

serverscan.title: Server Scan
serverscan.desc: Server Scanner that retrieves a lot of information on the remote machine (last logins, PHP/Apache versions & extensions, disk info, users, ram info, databases, processes, ip/routes...).

terminal.title: Terminal
terminal.desc: Let's you run commands on the remote server with a smart UI.

ftp.title: Files
ftp.desc: File explorer and manager (create, edit, upload, rename, delete...).
